statements: UPDATE patient_profiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE patient_profiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', date_of_birth = '1990-05-15', gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE patient_profiles SET email = 'johndoe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890', medical_history = 'No significant medical history' WHERE patient_id = '987e6543-21cb-40e8-e987-3f24a3d595ee';
